name: Hostile Makeover
summary: Solve a fashion murder mystery in this unique Hidden Object game! The world famous supermodel Amanda Manville has been murdered! Help smart and sassy Lacey Smithsonian investigate nine quirky suspects to find the killer in Hostile Makeover. Explore Washington DC, searching for clues and interviewing suspects. Along the way, collect and wear new fashions that grant special sleuthing abilities to crack the case!
